Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Therapeutic Hormone/Therapeutic Steroid Hormone/Therapeutic Androgen/Fluorotestosterone
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic nonaromatizable androgen analog of testosterone. Fluorotestosterone (6 alpha-fluorotestosterone) binds to and activates specific nuclear receptors inhibits and is equipotent to testosterone. (NCI04)
